channel.title: Turkey Bacon on Tiny Tavern
channel.description: Recent content in Turkey Bacon on Tiny Tavern

item.title: Build your Omelet (with cheese)
item.description: Mushroom, turkey bacon, sweet pepper, cheese, 1-Egg omelette served with 2 slices of toast: white or wheat.

item.title: Cajun Creamy Alfredo Pasta
item.description: Your choice of fettuccine, linguine, or penne tossed in a creamy Cajun Alfredo sauce and topped with Parmesan cheese.

item.title: Creamy Tomato Pasta
item.description: Your choice of fettuccine, linguine, or penne tossed in a creamy, tomato-infused sauce and topped with Parmesan cheese.

item.title: Jalapeño Turkey Bacon Panini
item.description: This delicious panini is made with turkey bacon, jalapeño, spinach, mushroom, and cheddar cheese sandwiched between two slices of multigrain bread.

item.title: Specialty Omelette
item.description: Mushroom, turkey bacon, sweet pepper, cheese, 1-Egg omelette served with 2 slices of toast: white or wheat.

item.title: TT's Signature Chicken Burger
item.description: This tender patty is made in-house and seasoned to perfection. It sits between two toasted brioche buns and is completed with lettuce, coleslaw, tomato, pickles, cheddar cheese, pineapple, jalapeño, chili pepper, turkey bacon, caramelized onions, bacon jam and a secret sauce.

item.title: TT's Signature Lamb Burger
item.description: This juicy patty is made in-house and is seasoned to perfection. It sits between two toasted brioche buns and is completed with lettuce, coleslaw, tomato, pickles, cheese, pineapple, jalapeño, chili pepper, turkey bacon, caramelized onions, bacon jam and a secret sauce.

item.title: TT's Supreme Breakfast Platter
item.description: (Served with 1-egg omelette) 1 pancake of your choice, 1 waffle of your choice, 2 omelettes of your choice (4 toppings maximum per omelette), 2 crispy turkey bacon, sautéed sausages, and 3 slices of toast.

item.title: TT's Talked About Panini
item.description: This delicious panini is made with turkey bacon, jalapeño, bell pepper, pineapple, and cheddar cheese sandwiched between two slices of multigrain bread.
